title: SQL Injection in User Authentication
description: The login form at /login.php is vulnerable to SQL injection attacks. An attacker can bypass authentication by injecting malicious SQL code into the username field.
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to https://vulnerable-app.com/login.php
2. Enter ' OR 1=1-- in the username field
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login
5. The application will log in as the first user in the database

additional_info.error_messages: MySQL error messages are displayed to users
